channel.title: Outdoors on Mischa van den Burg
channel.description: Recent content in Outdoors on Mischa van den Burg

item.title: Went on My First Camping Trip After Moving Back to NL From Norway
item.description: It was a nice week. I had an extra day off on Asenscion day and I decided to go for a camping trip for the first time after I moved back to the Netherlands. It was a great experience, and I wrote a couple of Tumblr posts with photos: https://www.tumblr.com/mischavandenburg/718093517925367808/first-trip-in-the-netherlands-part-1?source=share https://www.tumblr.com/mischavandenburg/718098930739593216/part-2?source=share Links: 202305232005 [[outdoors]]
item.content:encoded:
It was a nice week. I had an extra day off on Asenscion day and I decided to go for a camping trip for the first time after I moved back to the Netherlands.

It was a great experience, and I wrote a couple of Tumblr posts with photos:

https://www.tumblr.com/mischavandenburg/718093517925367808/first-trip-in-the-netherlands-part-1?source=share

https://www.tumblr.com/mischavandenburg/718098930739593216/part-2?source=share

[[outdoors]]

item.title: I Ran 10k For The First Time Today
item.description: I ran 10k for the first time in my life today. I ran to the beach and back in Heemskerk on hardened forest roads, listening to the birds and feeling the spring sun on my face. I felt great and had a smile on my face most of the time. Lots of interesting thoughts popping up in the mind as I run and reflect. Hardly noticed that 77 minutes went by because I was having such a good time.
item.content:encoded:
I ran 10k for the first time in my life today.

I ran to the beach and back in Heemskerk on hardened forest roads, listening to the birds and feeling the spring sun on my face. I felt great and had a smile on my face most of the time. Lots of interesting thoughts popping up in the mind as I run and reflect. Hardly noticed that 77 minutes went by because I was having such a good time.

Links:

202305141605

item.title: Started Using Tumblr for Travel Blogging
item.description: With the spring finally being fully released on the Netherlands, my wanderlust has awakened again after lying dormant for two years. In my 9 years in Norway I became a seasoned outdoorsman spending much time roaming the mountains and forests and always spending days or weeks out in the wild with my tent. When I moved back to the Netherlands this has been put on hold for a couple of years while I focused on changing my career on IT.
item.content:encoded:
With the spring finally being fully released on the Netherlands, my wanderlust has awakened again after lying dormant for two years. In my 9 years in Norway I became a seasoned outdoorsman spending much time roaming the mountains and forests and always spending days or weeks out in the wild with my tent.

When I moved back to the Netherlands this has been put on hold for a couple of years while I focused on changing my career on IT. Now that the career is rolling along nicely by the looks of it, I’m super excited to start exploring the Netherlands and see what the outdoors life is like in an area where the nature is significantly less wild and abundant.

I needed a solution to post pictures quickly and easily because I want to start logging my trips as well. My hugo setup is great for text and techincal content but I need something where I can easily post straight from my phone and Tumblr seems like the best option. I’ll also be posting more on Instagram from here on out.

Here is my first post:

https://www.tumblr.com/mischavandenburg/717301155801235456/went-to-heemskerk-today-broke-my-running-record?source=share

Links:

202305141505

https://www.tumblr.com/mischavandenburg
